msg: Load the Connector classes from their new package, with their new names.

author: remm
msg: - First part of the refactoring of the deployer, where HostConfig will be the only entry point for automated deployments
(= deployments where Container.addChild isn't directly used, as in the embedded world) and redeployments.
- This will allow removing a lot of the complexity involved with the fact that there was 3 components which had
deployment logic inside (HostConfig, StdHostDeployer, and the manager webapp). Now the manager webapp will "talk"
to the HostConfig.
- Some hooks on HostConfig are not there yet.
- Auto redeploy checks aren't done in HostConfig yet.
- ContextConfig is now (logically) in charge of parsing the context config files.
- New default web.xml and context config files have been added. This is not tested (actually, little of this is testedright now: the default
setup deploys ok, but more complex setups might not). Having default context config files should allow removing DefaultContext and its
complexity.
- The new default context config files are:
- conf/context.xml (so this is for all contexts)
- conf/<engine>/<host>/context.xml.default (per host)
- The new default web.xml is:
- conf/<engine>/<host>/web.xml.default (per host)
- Some of the paths to files are hardcoded, but I think I'll add configurability for most of them.
